plot: The eleven year old best friends, Ara and Mo, live in a refugee center where life isn't always as easy. It doesn't become easier when one of them suddenly disappear.
title: Salãm
plot_es: The eleven year old best friends, Ara and Mo, live in a refugee center where life isn't always as easy. It doesn't become easier when one of them suddenly disappear.
plot_en: The eleven year old best friends, Ara and Mo, live in a refugee center where life isn't always as easy. It doesn't become easier when one of them suddenly disappear.
